item.title: Install Kivy inside virtualenv
item.description: Install Kivy in pyenv virtualenv Requirements command line tools brew pyenv virtualenv Install # Install Kivy Requirements brew install mercurial sdl sdl_image sdl_mixer sdl_ttf portmidi # Create Virtualenv pyenv virtualenv 3.6.3 name_of_env pyenv local name_of_env # Install Cython pip install Cython==0.26.1 # Install kivy git clone https://github.com/kivy/kivy cd kivy python setup.py install Tested On macOS High Sierra (10.13.4) Homebrew 1.6.0 pyenv 1.2.2 pyenv-virtualenv 1.1.1 Inspired By https://gist.
